General.Name: Shyam Telecom Limited
General.Description: Shyam Telecom Limited engages in the trading of mobile accessories and home appliances in India. It offers cost effective RF repeaters, optical distributed antenna solutions, IP cellular backhaul systems, and signal enhancement accessories that provide seamless wireless coverage to mobile operators, real estate developers, neutral-host providers, and businesses. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: A-60, Naraina Industrial Area, New Delhi, India, 110028
